channel.title: Comments on: Acquisition of a Giant Egg

item.title: By: Third Time’s the Charm | GRAND MIGHTY
item.dc:creator: Third Time’s the Charm | GRAND MIGHTY
item.description: [...] my previous smog failure 1 | 2 with the Previa, I was left in a bit of a predicament. I had changed virtually everything I [...]

item.title: By: Wang
item.dc:creator: Wang
item.description: my fondest memory of a previa, was the one that was on its side in the middle of an intersection. narrow track + tall car = no bueno. luckily the motorcycle in the previa will lower your cg.
item.content:encoded: my fondest memory of a previa, was the one that was on its side in the middle of an intersection. narrow track + tall car = no bueno. luckily the motorcycle in the previa will lower your cg.

item.title: By: Eric
item.dc:creator: Eric
item.description: yup, I was originally looking for a pick up just like that, minus the lift and big tires
item.content:encoded: yup, I was originally looking for a pick up just like that, minus the lift and big tires

item.title: By: Kent
item.dc:creator: Kent
item.description: nice previa. =P my buddy has a 4x4 toyota pickup with monster tires. looks like this minus the front guard thing. http://memimage.cardomain.com/ride_images/3/108/361/25267680002_large.jpg about 76K miles on original motor, still runs strong. carb'd 4 banger though so i don't know if you'd still get it. i'd rock it as a daily but it'll prolly get bad gas mileage like my FC.
item.content:encoded: nice previa. =P my buddy has a 4×4 toyota pickup with monster tires. looks like this minus the front guard thing. http://memimage.cardomain.com/ride_images/3/108/361/25267680002_large.jpg about 76K miles on original motor, still runs strong. carb’d 4 banger though so i don’t know if you’d still get it. i’d rock it as a daily but it’ll prolly get bad gas mileage like my FC.
